General.Name: Anhui Hengyuan Coal Industry and Electricity Power Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Hengyuan Coal Industry and Electricity Power Co.,Ltd engages in the mining, production, washing, sale, and transportation of coal in China. The company offers lean coal, 1/3 coking coal, gas and fat coal, anthracite coal, and coking coal, as well as mixed coal, clean coal, lump coal, coal slime, etc. used in electric power, metallurgy, and chemical industries. It also engages in the power generation, coal engineering technology, and financial leasing businesses. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Suzhou, China. Anhui Hengyuan Coal Industry and Electricity Power Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of Anhui Province Wanbei Coal-Electricity Group Company Limited.
General.Address: No. 157, Xichang South Road, Suzhou, China, 234011
